module.name: MediaWiki Integration
module.description: This module integrates MediaWiki with ATutor, creating a single sign-on, and making MediaWiki available as a single shared wiki used as a course tool across all courses.

release.notes: Be sure to read the README file for the module for details on setting up single sign-on. While usable without single sign-on, it needs to be setup manually. You will be required to enable the module once installed, then enter the URL to MediaWiki through the MediaWiki tab added once enabled.
